manpage.title: _getch

description.para: Gets a character from the console without echo.

return.para: Returns the character read. There is no error return.

remarks.para: The _getch function read a single character from the console without echoing. It cannot be used to read CTRL+C. This function must be called twice, while reading a function key or an arrow key; the first call returns 0 or 0xE0 and the second call returns the actual key code.
